name: Crane Game Sim City
description:
The City Builder genre meets the Arcade Claw Machine. WARNING: It's a little unstable and may crash. Download a desktop version for smoothness, better sound, and breathtaking shadows.

Build cities as part of Metro-archipelago’s cheapest construction firm. Can you place new houses with a low enough casualty rate for your legal team to handle? You had better hope so, because this work is paying for your daughter’s education. She’s got big dreams.

Mouse left and right to rotate the crane.
Mouse forward and back to extend the crane.
Right click to lower crane, Left click to raise it
Space to let go of the payload

Good luck!

Game by…
Alex Cap - Music, Sound and Design (everything you hear in game, except the screams)
Carl Larsson - Programming, Design, and Applied Engineering (the crane)
Dan Colman - Programming, Design, and Applied Psychology (he made the little people)
Jon Pulsipher - Programming, Design, and Voodoo (he spent hours on a bug that just disappeared. Was it all just a dream?)
Wyatt Strain - Art, Design, and Camera filters (bloom)
